survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Scooter Sharing Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and experiences with electric scooter sharing services in urban areas.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gather frequency data. Ensure the options cover all possible usage patterns.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify key decision factors. Include an 'Other' option for additional insights.

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to collect qualitative feedback. Limit the response length to 250 characters.
